summary: This replaces the adult nude female skin with a more realistic natural hairy nude version. This skin is designed to work with the Calientes Beautiful Body Edition Vanilla body.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00FF00][size=20][u]Natural Women[/u][/size]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/62317-0-1436235859.jpg[/img]

Keywords: nude, Nude, naked, Naked, all, All, natural, Natural, women, Women, female, Female, adult, Adult, fur, Fur, hair, Hair, hairy, Hairy, furry, Furry, terminal, Terminal, body, Body, texture, Texture, default, Default, replacement, Replacement, realistic, Realistic, realism, Realism, immersion, Immersion, immersive, Immersive, black, Black, Caliente, Caliente's, Beautiful, Edition, CBBE, vanilla, Vanilla.~

[size=4]Description: This replaces all adult nude female skins with a more realistic natural hairy nude version. This is regardless of Race and does not change skintone. This skin is designed to work with the Caliente's Beautiful Body Edition Vanilla body. The hair is located on parts of the adult female body where hair would naturally grow, with additional parts added for a larger coated area of fur due to the colder climate of Skyrim.~ The available hair color is currently black for all adult females, I might do more hair colors in the future.~

Requirements: Skyrim,[/size][/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?][size=4][u][color=#FFFF00]Caliente's Beautiful Body Edition Vanilla[/color][/u][/size][/url][color=#00FF00][size=4].~

Installation: Simply extract to the folder The Elder Scrolls V Skryim/Data/textures/actors/character/female on your computer.~

Photos:

Created by myself, EnigmaWolf: 1st photo is of the actual DDS file the game uses to replace the adult female nude skin converted to JPEG to upload to The Skyrim Nexus. Future in-game photos are planned-

2nd Photo displayed in this description page is by xmp_tenacity, THANK YOU VERY MUCH!~

I highly recommend MysticBinary82's:[/size][/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/265/?][size=4][u][color=#00FF00]Bodyhair Nude Male HD[/color][/u][/size][/url]

[color=#FFFF00][size=4]navestsea's Original Files:[/size][/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6554/?][size=4][u][color=#00FF00]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/color][/u][/size][/url]


[size=4][color=#00FFFF]Permissions:[/color]

[color=#FFFF00]navestsea's Permission: Quote from the Description of[/color][/size] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6554/? ][size=4][u][color=#00FF00]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/color][/u][/size][/url]

[size=4][color=#FFFF00]"NOTE for people who seek permission to use my texture:
I give permission, just credit me as usual, no need to directly contact me as I might not be around."[/color]

AllenABQ's Permission: is not a member of this site, but his work is free-source.

[color=#893BFF]EnigmaWolf's Permission: I, EnigmaWolf, give free permissions to any who seek it for these files as long as I am credited along with the other co-creators.[/color]


[color=#FFFF00]Credits:[/color]

[color=#FFFF00]navetsea: Created the files in the first place.[/color]

AllenABQ: Created the hairy transparency layers, originally used for modding The Sims 2, I used the ambodynakedoverlay-black02_txtr_1024x1024.

[color=#893BFF]EnigmaWolf: I extracted navestsea's skin and used the ambodynakedoverlay-black02_txtr_1024x1024. to add more hair to femalebody_1 by carefully cutting and pasting more transparent hair layers.[/color][/size]
author: navetsea and EnigmaWolf
